summary: Completed frontend testing of Iteration 2 functionality for Spanish business application. Verified APTA company project creation, client dashboard access, and API functionality. Some asesor frontend navigation issues encountered due to session management.

ui_bugs.issue: Session management issues causing frequent redirects to login page during navigation
ui_bugs.selector: Navigation between companies list and company detail pages

passed_tests: Cliente apta (Industrias Renovables) login and dashboard access
Cliente lead (TechData) login and dashboard access
TechData marked as APTA with project created (phase=2, incorporation_status=pendiente)
Cliente apta sees completed incorporation status and project details in read-only mode
Cliente lead sees pending incorporation status and project details in read-only mode
Clients cannot edit project fields (no editable inputs found)
Clients see checklist in read-only mode with appropriate status indicators
Backend API functionality for project updates working correctly
Checklist auto-updates when project fields are filled via API
Project status can be updated via API (pendiente -> en_progreso -> completada)
Company information displayed correctly for both client types
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session management issues in asesor frontend navigation to prevent frequent logouts during company detail page access. The core functionality is working but navigation stability needs improvement.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Core functionality working, navigation issues present
